properties.displayName: TYANG-Storage accounts should use private link
properties.description: Azure Private Link lets you connect your virtual network to Azure services without a public IP address at the source or destination. The Private Link platform handles the connectivity between the consumer and services over the Azure backbone network. By mapping private endpoints to your storage account, data leakage risks are reduced. Learn more about private links at - https://aka.ms/azureprivatelinkoverview.

metadata.description: Enable or disable the execution of the policy

Specifies when the existence of the related resources should be evaluated. The delay is only used for evaluations that are a result of a create or update resource request. Allowed values are AfterProvisioning, AfterProvisioningSuccess, AfterProvisioningFailure, or an ISO 8601 duration between 0 and 360 minutes.
